OPENCTI_URL.description: The base URL of the OpenCTI instance.

OPENCTI_TOKEN.description: The API token to connect to OpenCTI.

CONNECTOR_SCOPE.description: The scope or type of data the connector is importing, either a MIME type or Stix Object (for information only).

CONNECTOR_LOG_LEVEL.description: The minimum level of logs to display.

CONNECTOR_AUTO.description: If True, the connector will automatically import data from the API.

KASPERSKY_API_KEY.description: API key used to authenticate requests to the Kaspersky service.

KASPERSKY_ZONE_OCTI_SCORE_MAPPING.description: Zone to score mapping. Only the numerical value need to be changed if necessary. See https://tip.kaspersky.com/Help/Doc_data/en-US/AboutZones.htm for further explanations

KASPERSKY_FILE_SECTIONS.description: Sections wanted to investigate for the requested hash. LicenseInfo, Zone and FileGeneralInfo are always set, can't be disabled. Only DetectionsInfo, FileDownloadedFromUrls, Industries and FileNames are currently supported
